GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY PRELOAD SCORE ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT CAN_CAPTURE CAN_PLACE_MANIPULATOR PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY UNIQUE_UNIT HEALED_BY_TIBERIUM SKIRMISH_AI_DONT_GARRISON SNIPER CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_Selected" or Prev == "ATNB" or Prev == "STATE_Run" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end;
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_boredToAttention") end;

AttributeModifierAffects.Exclude: CIVILIAN_BUILDING METAUNIT FS_BASE_DEFENSE HUSK AIRCRAFT STRUCTURE SUPER_WEAPON BRIDGE BRIDGE_SEGMENT BRIDGE_ENDCAP BRIDGE_GATEHOUSE CRATE TIBERIUM TIBERIUM_FIELD CAN_TOPPLE SIMPLE_OBJECT_PROP OPTIMIZED_PROP WALL_HUB WALL_SEGMENT
